rooms.description: Spacious entrance hall with ample natural light through windows placed according to Vastu principles.
Open living area designed for maximum ventilation and daylight; large windows along the facade.
Dining area adjacent to the kitchen with natural light through a skylight.
Modern kitchen optimized for ventilation and efficient workflow; strategically placed windows for natural light.
Small servant quarters designed with privacy and functional space in mind. Adheres to local building norms.

South-facing windows for balanced daylight and natural ventilation.
